alert.note: Alert for Grant; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 16 at 3:04PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Grant, southeastern Saline and northeastern Hot Spring Counties through 330 PM CST... At 303 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Traskwood, or 9 miles southwest of Benton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Benton... Bryant... Malvern... Haskell... Shannon Hills... Rockport... Traskwood... Tull... Perla... East End... Bauxite... Belfast... Magnet Cove... Sardis... Fenter... Gifford... Shaw... Glen Rose... Buie... Vimy Ridge... This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 96 and 117. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
